title: gpii-express-user core user schema
description: This schema defines the common format for user data transmitted and received by the gpii-express-user library.

email.description: You must provide a valid email address.

password.description: Passwords must be at least 9 characters long, and must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number or special character.

allOf.description: The password must be at least 8 characters long.
The password must have at least one uppercase letter.
The password must have at least one lowercase letter.
The password must have at least one number or special character.
